definition: to decorate/to embellish/to repair/to build/to write/to cultivate/to study/to take (a class)

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Bendera got into the garage with a copied key and brought round the car.
sentences.chinese: 同時本德拉用配的鑰匙進了汽修廠，開了輛汽車過來。

sentences.english: He lived with them in Benghazi, where he had an auto-parts shop.
sentences.chinese: 在班加西，他和父母住一起，有自己的汽修店。

sentences.english: The garage said the car was so old that it wasn't worth repairing.
sentences.chinese: 汽修廠認爲汽車太舊，不值得修理。

sentences.english: This tool is a must for every automotive technician or automotive shop.
sentences.chinese: 這個工具是要爲每一個汽修技師或汽車店。

sentences.english: I'm taking my car to the garage to be looked at.
sentences.chinese: 我正把車開到汽修廠去檢查。

sentences.english: The mechanics of the garage are repairing the car which had a car crash.
sentences.chinese: 汽修廠的機械師們正在修一輛剛剛出了車禍的車。

sentences.english: Hong Kong Institute of Control vocational education Cruz factory installed " aftermarket, " and try to make.
sentences.chinese: 香港專業教育學院汽修廠安裝了巡航控制，並設法讓。

sentences.english: How many car service centers in the world are located deep into the earth?
sentences.chinese: 有多少個汽修中心位於地球深處？

sentences.english: Don't play in a parking lot, near garage or around motor vehicles.
sentences.chinese: 不要在停車場，汽修廠附近或機動車周圍玩耍。
